name: mocha-gherkin
description: mocha-gherkin is a Gherkin-style interface and reporter add-on for mocha.
author: James G. Kim <jgkim@jayg.org> (http://jayg.org/)

scripts.cover: istanbul cover `npm bin`/_mocha --report json -- --opts tests/mocha.opts --recursive tests && remap-istanbul -i ./coverage/coverage-final.json -o coverage/lcov-remapped.info -t lcovonly
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover && cat ./coverage/lcov-remapped.info | `npm bin`/coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
